long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
BlinkSecure: Seamless Security for BlinkExam Online Tests
BlinkSecure is a specialized Chrome extension designed to enhance the security of online exams conducted through the official BlinkExam platform. By creating a controlled and cheating-free environment, BlinkSecure ensures that candidates can only focus on their exams without any distractions or unauthorized actions.
Key features include:
Full-Screen Mode: Automatically locks the exam page into full-screen, preventing tab switching or window changes.
No Copy-Paste: Disables copy-paste functionality to protect the integrity of the exam.
Seamless Integration with BlinkExam: Exclusively works with the BlinkExam platform, ensuring a secure and seamless testing experience.
Cheating Prevention: Blocks any attempts to leave the test window or access other applications.
Perfect for schools, universities, and remote proctoring, BlinkSecure guarantees a fair, secure, and distraction-free exam environment on BlinkExam.
